Content.Text:
You've upgraded your house! Oh yes,
very nice! All this extra room offers
lots of new possibilities!

You've built a salon! Oh yes, very nice!
Now you can get your hair cut!

You've built a cottage! Oh yes, very
nice! Place it in the town right away!

You've built an Eastern-style house! Oh
yes, very nice! Place it in the town
right away!

You've built an exotic mansion! How
majestic. Can't wait to see who is going
to live there!

You've built a newspaper carrier's
house! Oh yes, very nice! This is going
to help revitalize the town!

You've built a fantastical house! It's
quite ostentatious. Who's going to live
there?

You've built a pointy hat house! Someone
who can use magic might like to live
here? How mysterious it seems.

You've built a travel agency! Very
satisfactory work! Time to set out on
your travels!

You've built an inn! Oh yes, very nice!
Hopefully this will bring travelers into
the town.

You've built a restaurant! Oh yes, very
nice! This should mean some wonderful
meals lie ahead!

You've built a clinic! Oh yes, very
nice! This will bring stability to the
town.

You've built a bungalow! Very
satisfactory work! Place it in the
town right away!

You've built an architect's studio!
Oh yes, very nice! Place it in the
town right away!

You've built a Museum of Memories! Very
satisfactory work! I wonder what can
be seen there?

You've built a tailor's shop! Very
satisfactory work! One needs to be
well dressed, after all!

You've built a barn! Oh yes, very nice!
Now you can keep more animals!

You've built a coop! Oh yes, very nice!
Now you can keep more chickens!

You've built a pet house! Oh yes, very
nice! Now you can keep pets!

You've built a maker shed! Oh yes, very
nice! This gives you more room for new
equipment!

You've built a supply shed! Oh yes, very
nice! Now you've got room to store lots
more supplies!

You've built a greenhouse! Oh yes, very
nice! Now you can grow whatever you
like, whenever you like!

You've built a fishing shed! Oh yes,
very nice! Now you can raise fish
whenever you like!
